name: Okuma Epixor EB Series Baitfeeder Spinning Reel

reviews.name: Okuma Epixor EB Series Baitfeeder Spinning Reel
reviews.reviewText: Received the Okuma quickly, was the lowest price I could find on the net for the reel. It is made in China, but what can you say. Was the smoothest reel I have had, the 9 plus 1 bearings are evident in the characteristics of the reel. The baitfeeder function works as advertised. You could spend twice as much, but not receive more performance.
reviews.title: Best Price on the Net

reviews.name: Okuma Epixor EB Series Baitfeeder Spinning Reel
reviews.reviewText:
This makes my second set of Okuma baitfeeder reels.
I've owned a pair of the EB 30 reels for two years now; and they have been great.
No problems, always work, casts well, drag is good, baitfeeder works great.
Thats exactly what I want in a fishing reel.
I purchased a pair of the EB 50 reels because I am building a bit larger combo for river catfish.
The 50 series is a good "average" size reel; I'm not looking to build a surf rod.
I have absolutely no complaints with the Okuma EB series reels....that's why I bought two more.
reviews.title: Great Reel

reviews.name: Okuma Epixor EB Series Baitfeeder Spinning Reel
reviews.reviewText: You can't go wrong with this reel!!!!!
reviews.title: The best I have ever used!!!!!!!!
